With this Makefile, you can use the following targets:

* setup - Pull in 
* upgrade - Pull in new files from package-py

These targets are simply run by setup.py:

* build - Compile the Python modules
* test - Run the unittests
* devtest - Run the "developer only" tests
* register - Register this package to PyPi
* sdist - Create a dist bundle file
* upload - Create the dist bundle and upload it to PyPi
* clean - Remove the various generated files
